hero.title: AI-Powered Healthcare Assistant
hero.description: Get personalized health insights based on your symptoms and lab results using advanced AI technology.

features.title: Features
features.description: Our platform offers a range of features to help you manage your health and well-being.

learnMore.title: About HealthAI Analysis
learnMore.subheader: Understanding our AI-powered health analysis service

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Our AI-powered health analysis system uses advanced machine learning algorithms to analyze your symptoms and health data. Here's how the process works:
steps: You provide your symptoms and health information
Optionally upload lab results or medical documents
Our AI analyzes the data using a comprehensive medical knowledge base
You receive personalized insights and recommendations

technology.title: Our Technology
technology.description: HealthAI uses state-of-the-art natural language processing and machine learning technologies to understand and analyze health information. Our system is trained on:

privacy.title: Privacy and Security
privacy.description: We take your privacy and data security seriously. All information is:
points: Processed in compliance with healthcare regulations
Never shared with third parties without your consent

disclaimer.title: Important Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: While our AI analysis can provide valuable insights, it is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Always consult with healthcare professionals for:

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including:
points: Personal information (name, email address, age, sex)
Health-related information you choose to share
Lab results and medical documents you upload

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use the information we collect to:
points: Provide and improve our AI health analysis services
Communicate with you about our services
Ensure the security of our platform

dataSecurity.title: 3. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

yourRights.title: 4. Your Rights
points: Object to processing of your data

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.description: By accessing and using HealthAI's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.

license.title: 2. Use License
license.description: Permission is granted to temporarily use HealthAI's services for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
points: Use the materials for any commercial purpose
Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software contained on HealthAI
Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials

medicalDisclaimer.title: 3. Medical Disclaimer
medicalDisclaimer.description: The information provided by HealthAI is for general informational purposes only and is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

limitations.title: 4. Limitations
limitations.description: In no event shall HealthAI or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use the materials on HealthAI's website.
